flexboxy

Build Flexbox faster than ever!

The editor lets you build flexbox-based layouts, simply by drawing. The project is currently under development, meanwhile, legacy version is still available. To be notified when released, drop your email below.

No Code

No code knowledge is necessary. After drawing and adjusting sizes, you can easily export needed HTML and CSS, with auto-generated class names.
